task.title: Phone or Tablet
task.shortdesc: With the phone or the tablet Square users can securely accept any customer payment.

taskbody.context: This task illustrates how business owners can securely accept customer payment.

step.cmd: To accept debit and credit payments, Square business owners must download the Square app on their device.
Next, tap the "Sign in" or "Get Started" button.

substep.cmd: First time Square users will press the "Get Started" button and enter their email adress and password. Then, users will consent to Square's terms and privacy policy.
The "Sign in" button directs users to enter their email address and password.
Business owners that want to use a device code to sign into their POS without an email or password will tap "Use a Device Code".

step.cmd: After submitting your personal information, enable your device settings and notfications. When your device's settings and notification are enabled, press "Start using Square".
Business owners can take their first payment by pressing the button "Take First Payment" or Square users can skip the payment walkthrough by pressing "Skip Walkthrough"
To take the first payment, follow the directions located on your device:

substep.cmd: Enter $1.00 on the keypad or tap the library icon to access your items.
Now, tap Charge to check out.
Connect to a card reader to Swipe, Insert, or Tap to pay.
Enter the customer's email or phone number to send receipt.
Tap New Sale to return to the keypad.
